name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
WEEK	SESSION THEME
1	Introduction
2	Attitude I: I could never marry a foreigner
3	Attitude II: Screening and discussion
4	Attitude III: Further discussion
5	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Money I: Money makes us greedy
6	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Money II: Screening and discussion
7	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Education I: Teachers should let students learn
8	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Education II: Screening and discussion
9	Mid-term
10	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Crime I: The death penalty
11	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Crime II: Screening and discussion
12	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Crime III: Further discussion
13	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Women in Society I
14	Individual presentation (+Q&A)
Women in Society II: Screening and discussion
15	Women in Society III: Further discussion
16	Group presentation (+Q&A)
17	Group presentation (+Q&A)
18	Wrap-up
scorePolicy:
Assessment:
-	30% on mid-term examination
-	30% on final examination (in the form of group presentation)
-	40% on continual assessments: attendance to lectures; presentations; in-class performance; HOMEWORK
materials:
Required textbook*:
Further Communication Strategies by David Paul
*The textbook is not the only source of material used for this course.
